name: Soko-ban Revenge: User Gyakushuu-hen
overview: Soko-ban Revenge is a top-down puzzle game, it's the fourth entry in Thinking Rabbit's Sōkoban series. Like in the previous games the objective is to push all boxes onto certain marked spots. There is a limit on how many steps the player can take as they solve a puzzle. The game has 306 stages which can be played in any order, plus an edit mode where custom stages can be designed. New feature is the option to change character: Rabbi, Egyptian, Gran' Mama, Toy's Soldier and Termin.
